title: The Golden Louis
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: A tale of choice between a gambler’s need and his pity for a young homeless girl. Cast includes Anita Hendrie, Adele DeGarde, Owen Moore, Charles Inslee, Mack Sennett. Silent film with English intertitles.
